# LLMs.txt - Old Glory Dental Website

This file provides information about the Old Glory Dental website to help Large Language Model crawlers understand our content more efficiently.

## Website Overview
Old Glory Dental is a professional dental practice website built with Next.js. The site provides information about dental services, patient resources, and practice information located in Mansarovar, Jaipur, India.

## Content Structure
- **Homepage**: Main landing page with practice overview
- **Services**: Detailed information about dental treatments including:
  - Braces
  - Dental Implants
  - Root Canal
- **About**: Practice information and team details
- **Gallery**: Visual portfolio of dental work
- **Testimonials**: Patient reviews and experiences
- **Contact**: Appointment booking and practice location
- **Book**: Online appointment scheduling

## Key Information
- **Industry**: Healthcare/Dentistry
- **Location**: Mansarovar, Jaipur, India
- **Domain**: https://oldglory.in
- **Services**: General and specialized dental care including orthodontics, implants, endodontics
- **Doctors**: Dr. Ridam Jain and Dr. Tanmay Sharma
- **Technology**: Built with React, Next.js, TypeScript
- **Features**: Responsive design, online booking, patient resources

## Documentation & Resources
- **Next.js Documentation**: https://nextjs.org/docs
- **React Documentation**: https://react.dev
- **TypeScript Documentation**: https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs

## Crawling Guidelines
- All content is publicly accessible
- No authentication required for public pages
- Images and media files are in the /public directory
- API routes are for backend functionality and may not contain public content

## Contact Information
For technical inquiries about this website, please use the contact form on the site.
Practice Location: 124/505, Vikramaditya Marg, Sector 12, Mansarovar, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302020

## Last Updated
December 2025
